Class Priest

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model.Player
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model.Priest
public class Priest
extends Player
Priest object is a creatable Player object with some predefined stats and values, which makes him unique.
